title: (x) Tokion Magazine logo - custom designed {Stephen}
content:
Any idea what the logo font used for Tokion’s Magazine is?

Example Image -\>  
 [http://tmp.1pxsolid.com/tokion.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034404/http:/tmp.1pxsolid.com/tokion.png "http://tmp.1pxsolid.com/tokion.png")

 [‹ (x) Rock gig poster woodtype - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034404/http:/typophile.com/node/39808 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Building Letters Three sans w/ inverted 3 for E - Botanika {Sam Schlesinger} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034404/http:/typophile.com/node/40342 "Go to next forum topic")
author: 1pxsolid

comments.content: Probably custom, but URW’s [Futura Extra Bold P](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034404/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/futura_extra_bold_ot_std/?sample_text=TOKION&sample_size=96&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1)(oster) will get you close.
Ya thought so. Thanks for the help.
